title: Playing normals all night! Join me! teamspeak :)
body:
Just playing normals all night if anyone wants to join me :) its much more fun on teamspeak/vent/mumble. I have a server :)

I have been playing since lol came out and have 893 normal wins :) looking for any account/skill level lets just play and have fun :D
No ragers lol

Reply here and ill add you or just add me my name is lixxxx
